jd: From: Arpitha S, Stellar IT Solutions arpithas@stellarit.com Reply to: arpithas@stellarit.com WebSphere/Portal Java Developer- Only Citizens, ability to get US Public Trust ClearancePosition: WebSphere/Portal Java DeveloperLocation: RemoteJob Description:Skills/Qualification:·7+ years of experience in enterprise software development· Technical design, development, programming, and problem-solving skills· Experience working with HCL portal Themes and Skins· Proven experience in Portal Development with a focus on Portlets, Themes and Skins· Experience in designing and developing web applications using JSF, MyFaces, and Struts· Experience in Web applications migration of Struts, JSF, and Portlets to the latest version· Working knowledge of WebSphere Portal Server, WebSphere Content Management (WCM), and Portlets JSR168 & JSR286· Design and developing web applications using HCL Portal Server 9.5/ IBM WebSphere Application Server 9.x· Working knowledge of Hibernate and Spring Framework· Knowledge of Java and J2EE development using IBM Rational Application Developer for WebSphere (RAD)· Knowledge of JavaScript and JavaScript frameworks such as Dojo and JQuery· Experience in HTML, CSS, Ajax, including developing or working with services (RESTful or otherwise)· SQL development (exposure to Oracle database development a plus)· Ability to communicate clearly and effectively with peers, and management· Strong commitment to high quality work and timely deliverables· US Citizenship, ability to get US Public Trust Clearance Regards, Arpitha STechnical Recruiter Email: arpithas@stellarit.comRockville, MD | McLean, VA | Palo Alto, CAStellarIT.com | StellariDeaLabs.com
